The monthly gridded ST data from Climate Research Unit (CRU) version 3.22 is used in the present study for the years 1901–2005. This data is available with 0.5° × 0.5° latitude/longitude grid over land regions only over the whole globe. This data is produced by CRU at the University of East Anglia making use of more than 4000 weather station data globally
